io.netty.resolver

类 AddressResolverGroup<T extends SocketAddress>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.resolver.AddressResolverGroup<T>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable
    直接已知子类:
    DefaultAddressResolverGroup, NoopAddressResolverGroup

    @UnstableApi
public abstract class AddressResolverGroup<T extends SocketAddress>
extends Object
implements Closeable
    Creates and manages NameResolvers so that each EventExecutor has its own resolver instance.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getResolver

        public AddressResolver<T> getResolver(EventExecutor executor)
        Returns the AddressResolver associated with the specified EventExecutor. If there's no associated resolved found, this method creates and returns a new resolver instance created by newResolver(EventExecutor) so that the new resolver is reused on another getResolver(EventExecutor) call with the same EventExecutor.

      • newResolver

        protected abstract AddressResolver<T> newResolver(EventExecutor executor)
                                           throws Exception
        Invoked by getResolver(EventExecutor) to create a new AddressResolver.
        抛出:
        Exception

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes all NameResolvers created by this group.
        指定者:
        close 在接口中 Closeable
        指定者:
        close 在接口中 AutoCloseable
